5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Jabir bin ‘Abdullah that a man entered the mosque one Friday when the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) was delivering the sermon. He started stepping over the people’s shoulders, and the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:‘Sit down, for you have annoyed (people) and you are late.’”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي النَّهْىِ عَنْ تَخَطِّي النَّاسَ، يَوْمَ الْجُمُعَةِ
chapter.eng-name: Concerning the prohibition of stepping over the people’s shoulders on Friday
